# ecomore

[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/choisy/ecomore.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/choisy/ecomore)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/ecomore)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=ecomore)

## Installation

You can install the `ecomore` R package from GitHub by typing the following command:

```{r installation, eval = FALSE}
if (! "devtools" %in% rownames(installed.packages())) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ecomore2/ecomore")
```
